hero.title: How does DocumentoIQ work?
hero.subtitle: Intelligent document processing through advanced OCR and state-of-the-art language models to extract critical information with high precision.

step1.heading: 1. Document upload
step1.description: Drag your PDF to the panel or connect via API. We accept scanned documents, images or computer-generated files. No size limits.
step1.badge: Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, TIFF

step2.heading: 2. AI processing
step2.description: We combine advanced OCR with language models (LLM + NLP) to automatically identify text, legal entities, dates, amounts and key fields with accuracy above 90%. AI assists the analysis; control and final validation are always human.

step3.heading: 3. Structured results
step3.description: Export data in Excel, CSV or JSON to integrate into your systems, or review all information directly from the platform's visual panel.
